triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: UAVs are the central subject of this control systems survey paper.

triples.name: Control theory
triples.relevance: Control theory provides the mathematical and engineering foundations for the UAV control approaches reviewed.

triples.name: Equations of motion
triples.relevance: Motion equations are fundamental to modeling UAV dynamics and control system design.

triples.name: Autopilot
triples.relevance: Autopilot systems are key technologies enabling autonomous flight control in UAVs.
